mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EVENT_INFO(EVT_SEQ, EVT_NAME, EVT_FILE_NM, EVT_URL, REG_DT, REG_ID) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), #{eventName}, #{fileName}, #{url}, SYSDATE, #{regId})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_EVENT_INFO WHERE 1 = 1
AND EVT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{eventName} || '%'
ORDER BY TO_DATE(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') DESC
